Revenge
of the LIQUIDATORS

Thank you for your support!  
We were aware that a particular aspect of our NFT game would disqualify us for the 2021 Game Jam.
Since we are not in it for the gains, we made it anyway...

# From Team Wallet Amount Date
September 1st our journey began and on September 5th came to an end. Although our idea was only for the Aavegotchi Gaame Jaam 2021, we learned grew frustrated and had a lot of fun. We want to continue building Aavegotchi Raiders! The Liquidator's revenge and direct support from our community will make this possible to the best of its potential. We are young, new, and transparent. Please consider joining and building our community.
-Team

Meet the Team

With , from The CryptoHomies'


Mikal Muhammad

  • Full-Stack Web3 Dev
  • Smart Contract Developer
  • Project Manager

From South Central, California, Mikal is an Audio Engineer and studio owner (Twenty Seven Sounds Inc). Introduction into crypto, 2009 Bitcoin white paper. Favorite shows are Pensado's Place & Good Morning Crypto. Joined Ivan On Tech Academy in 2020 and started a Blockchain technology company in 2021 (Lynne House Publishing Inc.) using his unique insight, experience, and ability to bring protocols to the market where music and technology intersect.


Jonti Pizarro

  • Project Manager
  • Marketing
  • Front-end Developer

From Asbury Park, New Jersey, Jonti is a recording artist and developer. Introduction into crypto, 2020 DeFi Summer. Favorite shows are Dragonball Z, Power, and Good Morning Crypto. Joined Ivan On Tech Academy in 2020 and went full-time crypto in 2021. "I'm excited to be in this space. I'm on a mission to change the world with this technology!"


Eliezer Mia

  • Graphic Design
  • Post-Production
  • Social Media
  • Community Coordinator

From Eatontown, New Jersey, Eli is a Graphic designer. Introduction into crypto, 2016 Ethereum and DeFi. Favorite shows are The Wire, Good Morning Crypto, EllioTrades Crypto. "I started watching Good Morning Crypto in 2019, Ivan kept saying to go full time crypto and the eaiest way was to bring your current talents over to crypto, so I took his advice".
